TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ListViewItemType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the function of an item in the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType> enumeration identifies the function of items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control. You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType> enumeration to identify the type of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType> enumeration to check the type of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem> object.
<!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound/CS/ListViewItemDataBoundCS.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound/VB/ListViewItemDataBoundVB.aspx#1)] -->

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType DataItem = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A data item in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType EmptyItem = int32(2)

Docs.summary: An empty item in the control. The empty item is displayed when the control has no records to display, or when a group in the control has no more records to display.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemType InsertItem = int32(1)

Docs.summary: An insert item in the control.
